title: Michael Wilbon on the Wizards and Bulls revivals; Cassidy Hubbarth on Lakers-Celtics
description:
ESPN's Michael Wilbon joins The Woj Pod to discuss the Washington Wizards and Chicago Bulls revivals, Bradley Beal and DC, what star players want, and remembering deadline column writing. Plus: Cassidy Hubbarth on the Lakers-Celtics game Friday in Boston. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
